title: Kai Cenat built a streaming career on Twitch before NYC riot charges
description: Here's what to know about influencer Kai Cenat's rise to Twitch stardom and eventual riot charges.

title: ‘Interstellar shout’ restores NASA contact with lost Voyager 2 spacecraft
description: NASA’s antenna in Canberra detected a “heartbeat” from Voyager 2 after an erroneous command tilted its antenna away from Earth and severed contact.

title: Every start-up is an AI company now. Bubble fears are growing.
description: A February report helped kick off the AI boom by stating that ChatGPT had 100 million users. In reality, consumer interest in chatbots might not be that strong.
